alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 9:36AM EST until January 09 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed rain, freezing rain and sleet. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Virginia, Alleghany VA, Bath and Rockbridge Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Greenbrier and Western Greenbrier Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to rise above freezing by noon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
